headline: Alternative to Sublime and Markdown
description: I am currently using Sublime as my primary Markdown editor. Everything's perfect except for one thing: scrolling on Linux with a touchpad is terrible. I really like the third-party packages Sublime has i.e. syntax highlighting ( with MarkdownEditing) and automatic table creation (with Table Editor). I couldn't find any other apps that has all these features.
description_zh-Hans: 我目前正在使用Sublime作为我的主要Markdown编辑器。一切都很完美，除了一件事：在Linux上用触摸板滚动很糟糕。我非常喜欢Sublime的第三方软件包，即语法高亮（MarkdownEditing）和自动表格创建（Table Editor）。我找不到任何其他应用程序具有这些功能。
